issue.title: [Rust] Fix error in taking from structArrays with nulls
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10592](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10592). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Take currently does not take nulls into account.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10592?focusedCommentId=17332155) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
